creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
inscription: 昭和六年十二月 {Shōwa rokunen jūnigatsu} (December 1931)
markings: red artist's seal: 深水 {Shinsui} | publisher seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe} | on back, red seal: 貮百五拾枚絶版　第四拾八番 {nihyakugojū mai zeppan, dai yonjūhachi ban} (edition of 250, number 48) | red square publisher seal: わたなべ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper with mica
portfolio: The Second Collection of Modern Beauties (Gendai bijin shū dai nishū 現代美人集第二輯)
text: The Second Collection of Modern Beauties was another set of 12 prints issued in editions of 250. The First Collection of Modern Beauties had been completed in two years, but this new series took five years, because Shinsui was spending more time on his paintings.
title: Charcoal Foot Warmer
